--geplande uren (getransponeerd per datum)
WITH GeplandeUrenData AS (
    SELECT 
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (
            PARTITION BY pas.[Krow__Start_Date__c], 
                         pa.[Krow__Project_Resource__c], 
                         pa.[Krow__Krow_Project__c]
            ORDER BY pas.[Krow__Start_Date__c]
        ) AS RowNum, -- Unique key per partition
        pas.[Krow__Start_Date__c] AS StartDatum,
        pas.[Krow__Status__c] AS Status,
        pas.[Krow__Mon__c] AS UrenMaandag,
        pas.[Krow__Tue__c] AS UrenDinsdag,
        pas.[Krow__Wed__c] AS UrenWoensdag,
        pas.[Krow__Thu__c] AS UrenDonderdag,
        pas.[Krow__Fri__c] AS UrenVrijdag,
        pas.[Krow__Sat__c] AS UrenZaterdag,
        m.MedewerkerKey,
        p.ProjectKey,
        pr.PracticeKey
    FROM [s2_stg_salesforce].[ProjectAssignmentSchedule] pas
    LEFT JOIN [s2_stg_salesforce].[ProjectAssignment] pa 
        ON pas.[Krow__Project_Assignment__c] = pa.[Id]
    LEFT JOIN [s3_ods].[DimMedewerkers] m
        ON pa.[Krow__Project_Resource__c] = m.[MedewerkerIdSF]
    LEFT JOIN [s3_ods].[DimProjecten] p 
        ON pa.[Krow__Krow_Project__c] = p.[ProjectId]
    LEFT JOIN [s3_ods].[DimPractice] pr
        ON m.[Practice] = pr.[PracticeNaam]
),
UnpivotedData AS (
    SELECT 
        StartDatum,
        Status,
        MedewerkerKey,
        ProjectKey,
        PracticeKey,
        Weekdag,
        GeplandeUren
    FROM GeplandeUrenData
    UNPIVOT (
        GeplandeUren FOR Weekdag IN (
            UrenMaandag,
            UrenDinsdag,
            UrenWoensdag,
            UrenDonderdag,
            UrenVrijdag,
            UrenZaterdag
        )
    ) AS unpvt
    WHERE RowNum = 1
)
SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY dd.Datum, ud.MedewerkerKey, ud.ProjectKey) AS GeplandeUrenKey,
    dd.Datum,
    dd.WeekDagNaam,
    ud.Status,
    ud.GeplandeUren,
    ud.MedewerkerKey,
    ud.ProjectKey,
    ud.PracticeKey
FROM UnpivotedData ud
INNER JOIN [s3_ods].[DimDatum] dd ON 
    CASE 
        WHEN ud.Weekdag = 'UrenMaandag' THEN DATEADD(DAY, 0, CAST(ud.StartDatum AS DATE))
        WHEN ud.Weekdag = 'UrenDinsdag' THEN DATEADD(DAY, 1, CAST(ud.StartDatum AS DATE))
        WHEN ud.Weekdag = 'UrenWoensdag' THEN DATEADD(DAY, 2, CAST(ud.StartDatum AS DATE))
        WHEN ud.Weekdag = 'UrenDonderdag' THEN DATEADD(DAY, 3, CAST(ud.StartDatum AS DATE))
        WHEN ud.Weekdag = 'UrenVrijdag' THEN DATEADD(DAY, 4, CAST(ud.StartDatum AS DATE))
        WHEN ud.Weekdag = 'UrenZaterdag' THEN DATEADD(DAY, 5, CAST(ud.StartDatum AS DATE))
    END = dd.Datum
  --AND ud.GeplandeUren > 0 -- Optioneel: filter alleen dagen met geplande uren
ORDER BY dd.Datum, ud.MedewerkerKey, ud.ProjectKey;
